skins.selfIntroduction: I am part of the Eighty-Eight Fleet Program: first ship of the Kii-class battleships, Kii. In short, I never got a chance to shine during the war because reasons... But now I have, and I'm going to use it to its fullest! If you have anything that needs doing, just say the word, Commander!
skins.acquisition: Battleship Kii, reporting for duty! Is it true that I'd be able to fight without holding back over here? Heh, good stuff! I look forward to what the future has in store, and you should keep your eyes on me as well!
skins.login: Look who's finally clocked in, hahahah! My trigger finger's gotten itchy, so let's get on with a sortie already!
skins.details: Obviously I like being on the center stage with my massive cannons. Performance aside, their size alone boosts morale while intimidating the enemy. You get what I mean, Commander?
skins.secretaryIdle1: Tell me if anyone starts picking on you. I'll put them in their place! And I mean it, for the most part, you hear?
skins.secretaryIdle2: Mmghh! I'm feeling stiff after standing up for so long... What's up, Commander? Why are you blushing? ...My bra's coming off?
skins.secretaryIdle3: Hey, Suruga! What do you say to going drinking with me and the gang once work is done? Figures, always so antisocial... When people invite you, you should go with it!
skins.secretaryTouch: Something on your mind? I might be able to help you with it.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: "Friendly friskiness," is it? Hmm... Sure, I guess?

skins.shipDescription: Refreshing drinks, delicious food, warm sunshine... and a pool to beat the heat? Heh, isn't this the essence of summer?
skins.acquisition: Refreshing drinks, delicious food, warm sunshine... and a pool to beat the heat? Heh, isn't this the essence of summer?
skins.login: There you are, at last. Want to get something to eat, if you're hungry? Like dumplings, or a rice ball, or something.
skins.details: Hey Suruga, let's go somewhere¨C Come on, don't be all "I like it indoors" and "I'd rather not draw attention," just come out and enjoy the summer with us!
skins.secretaryIdle1: Akashi sure got that vending machine and stall set up quick... She's ingenious, but only when there's money to be made...
skins.secretaryIdle2: Why the hesitation? It's just a pool. Nothing wrong with just swimming together with me, is there?
skins.secretaryIdle3: Really looks like Amagi, Akagi, and all the rest are enjoying the summer. All thanks to you, Commander. You should be proud.
skins.secretaryTouch: Want to head to that other area? I'll come with you.
